accessory.examplemod.set_bonus.fire: Fire Set Bonus: +5 Elemental Power, +3 Damage
accessory.examplemod.set_bonus.water: Water Set Bonus: +30 Mana, +5 Mana Regen, +5 Defense
accessory.examplemod.max_set_bonus.fire: MAX Fire Set: +15 Elemental Power, +10 Damage, +50 Mana
accessory.examplemod.max_set_bonus.water: MAX Water Set: +100 Mana, +15 Mana Regen, +10 Defense, +20 Health
spell.examplemod.spark.desc: A tiny spark that ignites enemies
spell.examplemod.ember.desc: Floating embers that gently burn enemies
spell.examplemod.flame_burst.desc: Explosive burst of flames in all directions
spell.examplemod.magma_spike.desc: Molten earth erupts in deadly spikes
spell.examplemod.blaze_rush.desc: Channel the fury of blazes in a spinning vortex
spell.examplemod.inferno.desc: Summon a towering pillar of pure inferno
spell.examplemod.hellfire.desc: Unleash cursed flames from the Nether itself
spell.examplemod.phoenix_rebirth.desc: Rise as a phoenix, wings of flame consuming all
spell.examplemod.solar_eclipse.desc: Harness the power of a dying star - absolute destruction
spell.examplemod.water_splash.desc: Simple splash of water to push back enemies
spell.examplemod.ice_shard.desc: Sharp shard of ice pierces enemies
spell.examplemod.aqua_jet.desc: Powerful stream of water knocks down opponents
spell.examplemod.tidal_wave.desc: Massive wave sweeps away everything in its path
spell.examplemod.blizzard.desc: Relentless storm of ice and snow
spell.examplemod.poseidon_wrath.desc: Summon the sea god's fury with a lightning trident
spell.examplemod.glacial_prison.desc: Encase enemies in an unbreakable ice cage
spell.examplemod.ocean_guardian.desc: Summon an ancient guardian for protection and attack
spell.examplemod.absolute_zero.desc: Stop time itself with an ice storm of cosmic cold
